name: 30 Minutes game
description:
The challenge was to make a game in 30 minute but it actually  took min 1 hour and 10 minutes, I will update the game but not that much because I  prefer making better project, this was just to learn new things and I did learn many things in game development.

next Update coming to the game :

1 - score counter and high score.

2 - UI improvement.

3 - more challenges.

4 - main menu.

5 - sound effects.

6 - particle FX to make the game look epic.
